description: Developed automated server provisioning application, reducing deployment time by over 70% and ensuring consistent configuration across our fleet.
Led development and support of Linux-based OS for CDN, replacing error prone OS setup process, and collaborated with internal customers to identify fixes and improvements.

Built tools to automate setup of bare metal servers end-to-end, improving configuration correctness, further helping us meet our customer SLAs. Worked with operations engineers to refine tools based on feedback.
Created multi-team working group to streamline process of loading data into global IPAM platform, ensuring server metadata was correct and up to date.
Assumed ownership of bare metal servers, including software upgrades, hardware breakfixes, and network management.
Led migration of servers to a new colocation facility, reducing monthly datacenter costs by 60%.
Created tools to automate common business functions, reducing repetitive work and freeing up resources. One such tool, zoom-drive-connector, eliminated up to 30 minutes of manual work per day.
Setup and performed routine maintenance on companyâ€™s first GPU cluster. Created access policies for users and customer data.
